meta.title: Avalon Monrovia - Apartments in Monrovia, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Monrovia - Apartments in Monrovia, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Avalon Monrovia offers one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and two-story townhomes for lease. Imagine entertaining in our thoughtfully-designed living spaces with modern kitchens featuring quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. Live effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool and spa, and rooftop deck with grill area, pool table, lounge seating and TVs. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, smart access entry, smart thermostats, package service, and more. Avalon Monrovia is conveniently located in Old Town Monrovia and minutes from the San Gabriel mountains, offering scenic 360 views. We're located just off of the 210 freeway and Metro Gold Line, making commuting a breeze. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes are designed with sustainability in mind, so you can live in an environment thats lighter on the planet and its resources.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your home office away from home. Second Space provides all of the amenities of the office without the hassles of a commute.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Avalon Monrovia offers one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartments and two-story townhomes for lease. Imagine entertaining in our thoughtfully-designed living spaces with modern kitchens featuring quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances. Live effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool and spa, and rooftop deck with grill area, pool table, lounge seating and TVs. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, smart access entry, smart thermostats, package service, and more. Avalon Monrovia is conveniently located in Old Town Monrovia and minutes from the San Gabriel mountains, offering scenic 360 views. We're located just off of the 210 freeway and Metro Gold Line, making commuting a breeze. This is not just apartment living.
